title: our OCE skin ideas.
body:
Just saying but I think we should have Nasus with our OCE skin.
Now lemme give you my ideas I've had, and Nasus isn't the only one.

Dingo Nasus. *Dingo WW could also work*
^Sounds awesome to me.
We already have outback Renecton so nothing much there.

So what about Galah Azir? :) *The pink birds that fly around everywhere*
Or Crocodile Dundee Graves? Eh? sounds fucking amazing to me.
Or Animal Tamer Sivir?
Or Native Lucian/Ekko?

Maybe Huntsman Ka-Zix? *The spiders*
Gum-Tree Maokai.

These were just some ideas I had, what does everyone want for our OCE skin?

replies.body: How about not Native, as that is an outdated Australian term u racist

How was that racist at all?
Would calling them "Abbo's" or "Aboriginals" also be racist? (Probably)
I said Native because it also extends to NZ and other islands (I forgot what its called) above us.

Point, but still.
Riot didn't make "japanese skin", they made "japanese-themed" skins. Same for every population group.
Natives are people, not a theme.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=0005000000000001,timestamp=2015-05-24T03:21:15.804+0000)
>
> How about anything star-oriented? The southern cross is on both flags, maybe Soraka might be a candidate?
> Or a J. Cook themed Gangplank skin. Or Mundo. He explores what he pleases after all.
> Idk, just throwing out random things.

Seeing how most skin-making works, and how they want to do something that's not entirely Australia-sided or Kiwi-sided, Southern Cross Soraka might end up being a thing.
Hopefully.

I mean, they already made Outback Renekton, which kinda screams aussie skin, but not OCE skin. If it's not him, it can't be dingo, dundee or such things.
(And maybe they'd like to stay clear of racial themed skins)
Other then being racist (i would call Native Lucian/Ekko racist.) your ideas actually lack being OCE as a whole, which is riots reason for not having a skin yet.

I remember this massive thread on the forums about a "Cockatoo" skin by Red Arrow [[link](http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=85880)], since cockatoos are endemic to most of the region rather than just a few countries in the region. They suggested the "bird" champions like Quinn, Anivia, Azir etc. Naturally I pushed for it to be Quinn, but now that she's getting another skin I doubt that would happen.

Seems they got their wish of a Bilgewater Quinn skin though.
Before we start talking about giving champs who has 3+ skins more skins.Lets ask {{champion:154}} and {{champion:238}}

Zac is getting a skin, and Ive heard rumors of Zed skins too.
(Also Ekko-Kha-Lucian dont have many skins)

But I do agree that it should be givin to someone who doesn't have many skins compared to the rest.
